title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-4.13 - Support and backfilling requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-4.13 - Support and backfilling requirements

State Regulations

Where an underground facility will be disturbed or
uncovered by excavation or demolition, the operator of such facility shall
indicate to the excavator any preferred means of support or protection required
for such facility and any special backfilling requirements or provide any other
guidance for protection of an underground facility. Such information shall be
furnished to the excavator before the stated date of commencement of the work, if practical. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
753-4.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
